Coming to some noticeable disadvantages.. 1) The battery is not removable which makes it a problem to have a visit to service center if some problem occurs.. 2) The battery backup of d phone on standby is great Np in that.. but then if u use it for hardcore gaming with WiFi/mobile data continuous usage u wont b happy then.. 3) I,m a average user - MY USAGE STATS ARE MOSTLY - WiFi on whole time for whats app, Instagram, Facebook & decent gaming - This usage provides me around 10-11 hours of battery backup with screen on-time usage of around 4 hrs 30min or 5 hours.. which is no doubt great thing when u use net don't expect battery to b great... So guys a last thing to say if u looking out for budget smartphone provided by google with regular updates + brand-name+ casual gaming + quality and durability this for you...
